headline: Cyber Monday: Consumers expected to spend record $14.2 billion
summary: The online shopping deals aren't stopping as consumers search for value on Cyber Monday. Adobe Analytics expects shoppers to spend $14.2 billion in Cyber Monday purchases, up 6.3% from last year. Yahoo Finance senior retail reporter Brooke DiPalma takes a look at spending trends, while looking ahead to the major retailers expected to report earnings this week. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Stock futures fall, Trump's Fed pick, Cyber Monday: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are falling in Monday's pre-market trading to kick off December. Meanwhile, the crypto sell-off continues as bitcoin (BTC-USD) falls back below $86,000 per token. President Trump announced that he has made his decision for who will become the next Federal Reserve chairman after Jerome Powell's term ends in May 2026. Black Friday may have come and gone, but there's still plenty of online deals to be found on Cyber Monday. Adobe Analytics predicts online spending to increase by 6.3% year-over-year from last year's Cyber Monday shopping. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Crypto's 'torrid run', Retail spending, key earnings
summary: The trading week has started with investors in a risk-off mood. Bitcoin (BTC=F) is one of the biggest fallers today. Analysts are hopeful for a record Cyber Monday after a stellar Black Friday. Macy's (M), Salesforce (CRM), Dollar General (DG) and Dollar Tree (DLTR) are among the companies reporting this week. Aoifinn Devitt from Moneta joined Market Sunrise host, Ramzan Karmali with her thoughts on all of this and more.

headline: ARKO Corp. Appoints Galagher Jeff as Chief Financial Officer
summary: Jeff is a Seasoned Financial Leader with Significant Industry ExperienceRICHMOND, Va., Dec. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ARKO Corp. (Nasdaq: ARKO) (“ARKO” or the “Company”), a Fortune 500 company and one of the largest convenience store operators and fuel wholesalers in the United States, today announced that the Company has appointed Galagher Jeff as its Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective December 1, 2025.
